divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home with friend at 1>30 we saw only two guys on the street staring at sky, even when i passed them and split with my friend they were still watching so when i entered in smaller and darker street with clear view i looked in same direction and right next to the almost full moon there were light hoovering and slowly moving around moon then disappear and clouds were moving and then light appeared trough the clouds i texted my friend he wasn't able to see in that direction so he called me and i was still witnessing while walking home to see that light and when i wanted to film it then was gone... it all took more then few minutes. it was just a small light but was able to move fast and slow in one spot and to disappear in second
Summary: I saw a 2 guys staring in sky in direction of moon, i look at it also and i saw it hoovering for more then a minute or two
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mostar
This sighting has never been favorited.
